data.name: Adept Movements
data.description: Improved Stance abilities now cost 35% less AP.

data.name: Aethyric Armor
data.description: The power coursing through your blade is extended to your armor, increasing it by 412 and increasing your Disrupt chance by 5%.

data.name: Aethyric Grasp
data.description: Roots up to 4 enemies within 30 feet of you, making them unable to move for 5 seconds. Root has a 50% chance to break whenever hit.

data.name: Aethyric Insight
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters, and take 5% less damage from them. As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Aethyric Pandemonium
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters.

data.name: Aethyric Ward
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters, and take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Apotheosis of Flesh
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters.

data.name: Apotheosis of Mind
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points. As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Apotheosis of Spirit
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Balanced Accuracy
data.description: Increases your chance to critically hit by 10% while you have Improved Balance, or 20% while you have Perfect Balance.

data.name: Bend the Winds
data.description: Increases your Elemental resistance by 252.

data.name: Benediction of Morr
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters.

data.name: Benediction of the Dead
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters, and take 5% less damage from them. As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Benediction of Winters
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters, and take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Bladeshield
data.description: You become protected by a magical shell for a few moments which will strike back at any attacker for 600 damage and absorb up to 3600 damage for up to 10 seconds.

data.name: Blessing of Heaven
data.description: Path of Hoeth abilities will place an effect on your target for 10 seconds. During this time, any allies who strike the target will recover 88 health over 3 seconds.

data.name: Blurring Shock
data.note:
Requires Perfect Balance
Leads to Normal Balance
data.description: A powerful slash that deals 144 Spirit damage. For the next 10 seconds, each time the target is critically hit, they take an additional 75 Spirit damage.

data.name: Bolstering Enchantments
data.description: When Blade Enchants trigger they will now restore 270 health over 10 seconds to your group members within 100 feet of you.

data.name: Boon of Persistence
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Boon of Tenacity
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Boon of the Impalpable
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Bulwark
data.note: Only usable on Doors
data.description: Repairs a friendly keep door for 5% of it's total health over 15 seconds.

data.name: Calming Winds
data.description: Increase Disrupt chance by 10% when in Improved Balance, and 20% when in Perfect balance.

data.name: Centuries of Training
data.description: Upon striking a target with a direct damage ability there is a 25% chance to inflict an additional 252 Spirit damage over 3 seconds.

data.name: Challenge
data.description: You challenge all opponents in front of you, forcing monsters to attack you. While challenged, your opponents will deal only 70% damage to everyone other than you. This effect will fade after 15 seconds or after your opponent has hit you 3 times.

data.name: Champion's Challenge
data.description:
Both you and your target are held tightly in place for 10 seconds, and neither one of you can move.
This effect can not be dispelled or broken.

data.name: Crashing Wave
data.note:
Requires Perfect Balance
Leads to Normal Balance
Requires 9 points in Path of Vaul
data.description: You launch two powerful blows dealing a total of 262 Spirit damage and knocking your opponent down for 3 seconds. Your group members within 100 feet become Unstoppable for 4 seconds, granting immunity to all Stun, Knockdown, Disarm, or Silence effects.

data.name: Crushing Advance
data.note:
Requires Improved Balance
Leads to Perfect Balance
Requires Shield
Requires 13 points in Path of Vaul
data.description: A calculated shield maneuver that inflicts 144 damage and interrupts any spells being cast. Additionally, for the next 20 seconds, your block rate is increased by 5% and your armor will be increased by 618 points.

data.name: Cunning Assault
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%.

data.name: Cunning Evasion
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%.

data.name: Cunning Stratagem
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Dampening Talon
data.description: Dragon's Talon will now reduce the target's Block and Parry chance by 10% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Dazzling Strike
data.note:
Requires Perfect Balance
Leads to Normal Balance
data.description: When your blade hits your opponent it releases a blinding flash of light that deals 219 Spirit damage, and disorients your target for 5 seconds, increasing their build times by 50%.

data.name: Deep Incision
data.description: Quick Incision will now inflict an additional 448 damage over 10 seconds.

data.name: Deflect Oil
data.description: 10% reduction in damage taken by Oil siege engines. You will also protect two other group mates within 30 feet. Only one effect of this type may be on a player at a time.

data.name: Demolishing Strike
data.description: A powerful melee attack that reduces armor by 1056 and deals 900 damage over 15 seconds

data.name: Discerning Offense
data.description: Your attacks have a 10% reduced chance to be defended against.

data.name: Distracting Bellow
data.description: A loud shout that startles your target and all enemies within 30 feet of them, reducing their damage to 50% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Dragon's Talon
data.note:
Requires Perfect Balance
Leads to Normal Balance
data.description: You release two rending blows that deal 97 Spirit damage each, crippling your target for 4 seconds, reducing the damage they deal with every attack to 80%.

data.name: Eagle's Flight
data.note:
Requires Improved Balance
Leads to Perfect Balance
data.description: A guarded strike that deals 144 damage and improves your chance to parry by 25% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Ensorcelled Agony
data.description: Ensorcelled Blow will now cause an additional 365 Spirit damage over 5 seconds.

data.name: Ensorcelled Blow
data.note: Leads to Improved Balance
data.description: A quick precision slash that calls out the enchantment in your blade dealing 119 Spirit damage.

data.name: Ether Dance
data.note:
Requires Perfect Balance
Leads to Normal Balance
Requires Great Weapon
Requires 13 points in Path of Khaine
data.description: You focus on your target, slashing repeatedly for up to 3 seconds, striking them up to five times and dealing 190 Spirit damage with each hit.

data.name: Favour of the Gods
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%, and you take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Favour of the Mad
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%, and you take 5% less damage from them. As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Favour the Daemonic
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Offense
data.description: You deal 15% more damage and all enemy monsters will hate you 15% less than normal, but your armor is reduced by 33%.

data.name: Forceful Shock
data.description: Blurring Shock now knocks back players and knocks down monsters.

data.name: Graceful Strike
data.note: Leads to Improved Balance
data.description: A swift attack that deals 72 damage and Cripples for an additional 135 damage over 5 seconds. Monsters struck with this technique will hate you more.

data.name: Great Weapon Mastery
data.description: When you are wielding a Greatweapon, your chance to parry is increased by 5% and all damage you deal is increased by 10%.

data.name: Gryphon's Lash
data.note: Leads to Improved Balance
data.description: A fierce attack that deals 144 damage and cannot be Blocked or Parried.

data.name: Guard
data.note: Only usable on other players
data.description: You defend one of your groupmates and try to take attacks meant for them. As long as you are within 30 feet of them, any damage that they suffer will be split evenly between the two of you, and 35% of all hate that they cause will be redirected to you.

data.name: Guard of Steel
data.description: Protective magic increases Toughness by 120 for 10 seconds for each group member within 100 feet.

data.name: Gusting Wind
data.note:
Requires Perfect Balance
Leads to Normal Balance
data.description: You execute a quick spin, rending the air around you and producing a magical shockwave that which deals 70 Spirit damage to all opponents within 30 feet of you, knocking back enemy players and knocking down monsters.

data.name: Harrier's Ken
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you, and you take 5% less damage from them. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Harrier's Pelt
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you, and you take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Harrier's Savagery
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Heaven's Blade
data.description:
You enchant your blade with the spirit of the heavens. All your melee attacks gain a 25% chance to reduce all of your target's resistances by 157 for 10 seconds.

You may only have 1 Blade Enchantment active at a time.

data.name: Hold The Line!
data.note: Requires Shield
data.description:
You focus your defenses against enemy fire, increasing your chances to dodge and disrupt by 45% for 12 seconds. You will also defend all allies behind you, up to 50 feet away, increasing their chances to dodge and disrupt by 15% as long as they remain at your back. Allies may have this effect stacked on them up to 3 times.
This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of action points.

data.name: Immaculate Defense
data.description: An impressive display of defense which reduces incoming damage by 75% for both you and all group members within 100 feet of you for 10 seconds.

data.name: Impeccable Reactions
data.description: Each time you parry an attack, you will also parry the next attack. This double parry can not occur more than once every 5 seconds.

data.name: Intimidating Blow
data.note:
Requires Improved Balance
Leads to Perfect Balance
data.description: An overpowering strike that deals 169 damage and decreases your opponent's morale by 100.

data.name: Isha's Protection
data.description: Heals are 20% more effective on you.

data.name: Juggernaut
data.description: You become filled with unstoppable power, removing all snaring, rooting, silencing, and disarming effects.

data.name: Lingering Intimidation
data.description: Intimidating Blow will now reduce your target's chance to Critically hit by 25% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Menace
data.description: Enemy monsters will hate you 100% more than normal on all attacks.

data.name: Modify War Engine
data.note: Not usable on Siege Rams or Oil
data.description: You shield the Ram absorbing 1500 damage over the next 30 seconds.

data.name: Nature's Blade
data.description:
You enchant your blade with the spirit of nature. All your melee attacks gain a 25% chance to randomly steal 75 stat points from targets within 30 feet of you for 10 seconds. During this time, both you and groupmates within 100 feet will benefit from the stolen stats.

You may only have 1 Blade Enchantment active at a time.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Clever
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points. As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Cunning
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Dim
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Perfect Defenses
data.description: Increase Block and Parry chances by 5% when in Improved Balance, and 10% when in Perfect balance.

data.name: Phantom's Blade
data.description:
You enchant your blade with the spirits of the dead. All your melee attacks have a 25% chance to activate a shield that absorbs up to 325 damage over 10 seconds.

You may only have 1 Blade Enchantment active at a time.

data.name: Phoenix's Wing
data.note:
Requires Improved Balance
Leads to Perfect Balance
Requires Great Weapon
Requires 9 points in Path of Khaine
data.description: A broad slash that hits all opponents in front of you for 125 damage, as well as increasing hate from monsters.

data.name: Poised Attacks
data.description: Attacks dealt from Improved or Perfect Balance are 10% harder to defend against.

data.name: Potent Enchantments
data.description: Blade Enchantments will also deal 540 damage over 9 seconds whenever they trigger.

data.name: Protection of Hoeth
data.note:
Leads to Improved Balance
Requires 9 points in Path of Hoeth
data.description: You call upon the magic in your blade to form a barrier to protect you, absorbing up to 550 damage for up to 5 seconds on groupmates within 50ft.

data.name: Quick Incision
data.note:
Requires Improved Balance
Leads to Perfect Balance
data.description: A rapid slash to your opponents legs that deals 119 damage and snares them by 40% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Raze
data.description: Repeatedly attack all enemies in a line in front of you, inflicting 300 damage every second for 3 seconds, up to 65 feet away.

data.name: Redirected Force
data.note:
Requires Block, Disrupt, Dodge, or Parry.
Requires 5 points in Path of Vaul
data.description: Redirects the force of a blocked blow into a devastating attack dealing 169 damage and generating a large amount of additional hate from monsters.

data.name: Rugged
data.description: Increases Toughness by 160.

data.name: Sapping Strike
data.note:
Leads to Improved Balance
Requires 5 points in Path of Khaine
data.description: A targeted strike that saps the energy from your target dealing 119 damage and reducing your opponent's AP by 10 every second for 5 seconds.

data.name: Shadow Blades
data.description: All enemies within 30 feet suffer 1200 Spiritual damage over 12 seconds, and will steadily lose 28 Morale.

data.name: Shatter Enchantment
data.note: Target must have an Enchantment
data.description: A shattering attack that removes one Enchantment from your enemy and do 119 damage.

data.name: Shield of Valor
data.note:
Requires Shield
Requires 15 points in Path of Vaul
data.description: Everyone in your group regains 200 action points and is protected by a magical barrier for 10 seconds which will absorb up to 3000 damage.

data.name: Shield Wall
data.note: Requires Shield
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, your chance to block is almost guaranteed.

data.name: Sky Titan's Bulwark
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%.

data.name: Sky Titan's Favor
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%.

data.name: Sky Titan's Strength
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%. As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Sudden Shift
data.description:
With a graceful sweep, you quickly change your stance and prepare for battle.

No Balance: You gain Improved Balance.
Improved Balance: You gain Perfect Balance.
Perfect Balance: You gain Improved Balance.

data.name: Taunt
data.description: You enrage your opponent, interrupting any currently building abilities and forcing monsters to attack you. While taunted your opponent will take 30% more damage from your attacks. This effect will fade after 15 seconds or after your opponent has hit you 3 times.

data.name: Throw
data.description: A basic throwing attack that inflicts 97 damage. Has a chance to deal 696 damage to a severely wounded target if you are behind them.

data.name: Unstoppable Juggernaut
data.description: Juggernaut's cooldown is reduced to 20 seconds.

data.name: Vaul's Buffer
data.description: On a successful Block, Parry, Dodge or Disrupt you will absorb up to 400 damage over the next 10 seconds. This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Wall of Darting Steel
data.note: Requires Great Weapon
data.description: You spin your greatsword with astounding speed forming a wall of steel between you and your opponent. Increasing your chance to Dodge, Disrupt and Parry attacks by 50% and whenever you defend against attack you will reflect back 100 Spirit damage.

data.name: Whirling Geyser
data.note:
Requires Great Weapon
Requires 15 points in Path of Khaine
data.description: A spinning attack that inflicts 800 damage to all enemies within 30 feet and then knocks them away.

data.name: Whispering Wind
data.note:
Requires Perfect Balance
Leads to Normal Balance
Requires 13 points in Path of Hoeth
data.description: You release two swift blows that deal 109 Spirit damage each, interrupting any building attack and will Silence your target for 4 seconds. The winds then aid group members within 100 feet for the next 10 seconds by decreasing the cooldown of abilities used by 5 seconds.

data.name: Wings of Heaven
data.description: You magically leap through the air towards your target. When you land, all enemies around you will become snared for 10 seconds, reducing their run speed by 60%.

data.name: Wrath of Hoeth
data.note:
Requires Improved Balance
Leads to Perfect Balance
data.description: The magic from your blade is released in a staggering explosion that deals 120 damage to all opponents within 30 feet. In addition your opponent's Spiritual resistance will be reduced by 236 for 20 seconds.
